● 이용 및 정기 구독 안내
∙ 자기만의 방은 구독형 콘텐츠 서비스로 선택하신 기간 모든 콘텐츠를 무제한 이용하실 수 있습니다. (1개월 구독권 월 4,900원 / 연 47,000원)
∙ 구독하지 않아도 일부 무료 콘텐츠를 계속 이용할 수 있습니다.

● 정기 구독 주의사항
∙ 결제는 구매 시 iTunes 계정으로 진행됩니다.
∙ 자동 결제의 관리 및 해지는 앱스토어 > 메뉴 > 계정 > 구독 혹은 앱스토어의 메뉴 > 정기결제에서 이용 기간 중 언제든 가능합니다.
∙ 정기 구독 취소를 하더라도, 다음 갱신 시점까지는 구독이 유효하며 정상적으로 서비스 이용이 가능합니다.
∙ 정기 구독 주기가 끝나기 24시간 이내에 다음 구독 갱신에 대한 비용 확인 및 청구가 진행됩니다. 즉 정기 구독 주기가 끝나기 최소 24시간 전에 취소 상태가 아니라면 구독 갱신 결제가 진행됩니다.
∙ 회원 탈퇴 혹은 앱을 삭제해도 iTunes 구독이 별도로 취소되지 않으니 iTunes 계정 설정에서 구독을 취소해야 합니다.
∙ iOS 결제 관련 문의(중복구매 처리, 환불, 구독권 미지급 등)는 애플 고객센터로 문의하셔야 처리가 가능합니다. 기본적으로 구독 중 남은 기간에 대한 환불은 가능하지 않습니다.

● 접근 권한
∙ 선택 접근 권한에 동의하셔야 다음의 기능을 사용하실 수 있습니다.
  ∙ 알림 : 신규 및 추천 콘텐츠, 월경 주기, 댓글 및 활동 관련 알림 발송
∙ 선택 접근 권한은 허용에 동의하지 않아도 서비스 이용이 가능합니다.

MDLA is a new kind of fashion magazine - a fashion magazine designed for how we consume fashion online today.

Many of us born in an online generation can only sigh in nostalgia at the glamour and wonder of print fashion magazines from the early 2000s. As the world moved online, the once iconic fashion media companies failed to evolve - they gave us lazy pdfs to browse on slow and buggy e-readers as Inst*gr*m took over to give us the fast immersive content we wanted. Their disinterest in the preservation of beauty online is clear and it’s time we had a new medium to explore and appreciate fashion for fashion’s sake. MDLA is an experiment to revive the glory of early fashion media re-imagined through powerful online media technology from present day.

Our first iteration MDLA Runway brings you a variety of powerful features you’d expect from a modern fashion runway viewer:

* Intuitive Interface - Flip through runway looks with a simple swipe or drag. Jump through to your favorite designer’s early years with just a tap and slide. No endless scroll, no ads, no interruptions

* Powerful search - Search for your favorite collections down to their specific year and season. Find archive collections by your favorite designers from their early years and from labels they previously worked at. Don’t worry about typos or using shorthands - we know what you mean :)

* Lightning fast - Browse high resolution look images from the runway loaded in a flash of a second

* 3D Showcase - Play around with high resolution 3D captures of rare archive “grail” pieces complete with added context from its rich fashion history and references from its original collection for you to explore and learn

* Immersive Editorials - Explore our selection of hand-curated stories of iconic archive pieces, profiles of in vogue runway designers, lost fashion techniques and striking editorial campaigns

Our catalog features thousands of collections dating back to the early 90s from the most iconic names in fashion
Browse the archives from your favorite labels: Dior - Gucci - Louis Vuitton - Prada - Balenciaga - Saint Laurent - Margiela
As well as your favorite designers: Raf Simons - Rick Owens - Tom Ford - Alexander McQueen - Hedi Slimane - Virgil Abloh - Issey Miyake

Coming soon: 
- Create a moodboard of your favorite runway looks and share with friends
- Section to browse latest fashion week collections (eg: nyfw 2023)
- Support for iPad

MDLA is for high fashion followers, meticulous moodboard makers, archive fashion collectors, y2k fashion magazine enjoyers, small town gossip girl lovers, vintage fashion shoppers, aesthetics respecters, ‘it’ girls, clout guys, connoisseurs, hobbyists, tasteful amateurs and most importantly, you :)

title.label: Runway Fashion Design by MDLA - MDLA

- 지자체, 공공기관, NPO 등의 소식과 정보들을 한눈에 보고 저장/공유할 수 있어요.
- 관심 키워드와 개인 정보를 설정하고 맞춤형 소식 알림을 받을 수 있어요.
- "동네신청"을 통해 우리 동네의 교육 및 프로그램을 신청할 수 있어요.

슬리버를 통해 세상을 더 쉽게 읽어보세요.

[다른 어떤 뉴스앱보다도 뛰어난 뉴스 가독성]
: 긴 줄글의 뉴스 기사를 문단마다 구분해 가독성을 개선했습니다. 또한 문단마다 배경색을 커스터마이징 할 수 있도록 하여 자신에게 더욱 알맞은 '읽기 환경'을 만들 수 있어요!

[문단 추천으로 완성한 최고의 뉴스 큐레이션]
: 기사 추천과 함께 문단 추천이 이루어져요! 이를 통해 메인 화면에서 기사를 들어가지 않고 바로바로 그날의 중요한 소식들을 확인할 수 있어요!

[하이라이트 표시로 중요한 문단을 한 눈에]
: 뉴스 기사 중 중요한 문단이 어디인지 한 눈에 알 수 있도록 '문단 하이라이트 기능'을 제공하고 있어요! 시간이 없는 경우에는 하이라이트 문단만 읽어도 기사 내용을 알 수 있을거예요!

[이제 검색을 바로]
: 뉴스를 보다가 검색이 필요한 경우 문단 내 검색탭을 통해 바로 검색할 수 있어요! 검색과 뉴스보기를 동시에 즐겨보세요.

[내 반응을 원하는 곳에]
: 문단마다 좋아요를 누를 수 있어요! 마음에 드는 내용이나, 다른 사람들이 꼭 읽었으면 좋겠는 문단에 좋아요를 꾸욱 눌러주세요!

[원하는 문단만 공유하기]
: 뉴스를 읽다가 중요한 문단만 쏙쏙 골라 공유해보세요. 문단별 공유하기를 통해 내 의견이 상대방에게 더 정확히 전달됩니다.

[기사 내용과 댓글을 함께]
: 뉴스 문단마다 댓글을 달 수 있도록 하여, 댓글과 뉴스 내용을 같이 볼 수 있도록 구성하였어요! 이를 통해 다른 사람들이 어떻게 생각하는지 더 잘 알 수 있어요!

주어지는 주제로 자신에게 답변을 해보세요.
나의 삶을 되돌아보는 기회가 될지도 모릅니다.

Noa brings you the world’s best journalism, curated by editors and read aloud by professional voice actors. We aim to provide multiple perspectives on trending news topics, through a highly involved curation process where Noa’s editors hand-pick the very best articles from the world's best publishers.

In a world with polarised opinions and ideology-driven media coverage, are you seeking multiple viewpoints? Start listening to Noa to save you time in exploring varying perspectives and to help you stay informed on the topics everyone is talking about.

It integrates easily into your daily or weekly routine. Listen while exercising, driving, cooking, or walking.

TOP PUBLISHERS. ONE APP
Our partnering publishers include

• The Economist
• Harvard Business Review
• The Washington Post
• The Telegraph
• Bloomberg
• The New York Times
• Fast Company
• Insider
• MIT Technology Review
• Foreign Affairs
• The Independent
• The Conversation
• And more.

OUR EDITORIAL PRINCIPLES	
1. Multiple Perspectives: Offer multiple perspectives from trusted sources and empower listeners to make up their own minds on where they stand on a topic.
2. Thought-provoking: Present audio articles that inform, inspire, and offer fresh insights, through both a global and a national lens. Focus on opinion, feature, and analysis articles.
3. Storytellers: Be storytellers and educators. Help our listeners understand global topics, and perspectives, while also telling the stories of the people behind the headlines.
4. Global Impact: Ensure coverage and raise awareness of important topics, regardless of a topics popularity or ability to drive “clicks”. 
5. Fourth Estate: Uphold journalism’s values as a democratic check on power. And always celebrate great journalism.
6. Embrace Complexity: Encourage thought and avoid black and white explanations that aren't followed with depth. The world is complicated and can seldom be explained in minutes. Our goal is to help listeners navigate it. 

AUDIO STORIES
Listening to the best journalism is a great way to learn and grow, especially when you don’t have time to read. Audio articles are produced and recorded daily by Noa’s talented voice actors – Sam Scholl, Adrienne Walker, Peter Hanly, Martin Buchanan, Les Smith, Grainne Brookfield and Jessie McGee. They’re probably in the booth recording as you read this!

AUDIO SERIES
Each day, Noa’s editor’s select the very best audio articles and add them to topic-specific playlists. Every Series begins with a short explainer – written by a Noa editor – that provides valuable context on the subject at hand before you dive in. Within 20-30 minutes, you’ll walk away fully informed.

AUDIO FEATURES
Along with the usual audio features, you’ll find: CarPlay, AirPlay, Offline Mode, Sleep Timer, Playback Speed Adjustment, an editable Article Queue, and Rewind and Fast-forward.

ADDITIONAL FEATURES
We know you expect more. That’s why the Noa app also offers:
• In-app chat (we respond quickly)
• My Stats to view your daily streak and listening stats
• Save, Download, and Follow
• Share – articles and Series
• Read Along

ALWAYS FREE
You can listen to the free tier of Noa without any need to pay. You’ll get a weekly article allowance and access to most of our publishers.

PREMIUM FEATURES
By choosing to support Noa with a monthly or annual subscription you’ll get unlimited, ad-free access to over 18k audio articles (and counting) from the world’s best publishers, including our Premium-only publications. We would love to welcome you as a member of Noa’s growing community.

COMMITMENT TO YOUR PRIVACY
We’re real people, just like you and we take great care to protect your data. Noa does not share your data with others or allow advertisers to track you. Your data is used solely for the purpose of providing you with the best news, learning, and listening experience possible.

Stay expertly informed on the stories you care about, wherever your day takes you. Download the Telegraph app to enjoy the full range of our award-winning journalism on your schedule, with breaking news updates and the daily newspaper.
 
READ THE DAILY NEWSPAPER ON YOUR PHONE OR TABLET
Download the digital version of the Daily and Sunday Telegraph newspapers and browse them cover to cover, anytime, anywhere. You can read each edition from 5am every morning, while inside you’ll find all your favourite sections, supplements and magazines, including Stella and The Telegraph Magazine.
 
Once you’ve downloaded that day’s edition of the newspaper, you can enjoy it online or offline. So whether you’re travelling to work, need some food for thought over lunch, or you’re just relaxing at home, you’ll always be able to turn to our illuminating insight, in-depth analysis, uncompromising commentary and more.
 
 
FOLLOW THE LATEST BREAKING NEWS
Never miss the stories that are shaping our world, with live updates as they develop. Visit the “Latest” section and you’ll find up-to-the-minute headlines to keep you constantly updated.
 
From political drama and global movements to economic developments and sporting action, you’ll be assured a trusted, insider’s perspective, courtesy of our unrivalled team.
 
 
ENJOY NEWS THAT WORKS AROUND YOU
All of our articles are organised by familiar sections and topics. Which makes it easier than ever to focus your attention on the stories that matter to you.
 
READ SUBSCRIBER-EXCLUSIVE NEWSLETTERS
Explore even more insight from your favourite journalists in their latest subscriber-only newsletters, all within the app. Your chosen newsletters will appear as soon as they’re published, so you can enjoy them without having to scour your email inbox. 
 
Newsletters in the app include Matt’s weekly newsletter, with all of his cartoons from the week and an exclusive extra weekly cartoon. You’ll also find newsletters like Your Royal Appointment, Investor and Beyond Brexit Bulletin, all available to read directly in your app.
